short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds dual language subtitles for language learners on Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multiflix helps you learn a foreign language while watching content on Netflix.

Anki users may benefit from sentence mining and generation of natural-sounding speech.

- SIMPLE USAGE
1.Click to stream a Netflix content of your preference
2.Hover your mouse over the screen
3.Click on the "Multiflix" icon that appears

- DUAL SUBTITLES
Displays dual, human-made subtitles on screen at the same time.

- EXPORT SUBTITLES
âœ… Merges subtitle lines to build complete sentences.
âœ… Exports subtitles in cross-platform compatible format (CSV) ready to be imported into Anki.

- ðŸŒŸGENERATE HIGH-QUALITY TEXT-TO-SPEECHðŸŒŸ
âœ… Converts subtitle sentences into natural-sounding speech to improve your listening and speaking skills.
âœ… Exports audio tracks + subtitle lines (optionally import the resulting content into Anki).
